extendedInfo.description: This game is dedicated to all the erudite persons and lovers of intellectual online games.Ask your friends to download the app and play with them online! More downloads - more participants-more fun! Share game thru Facebook, Twitter, Google+ etc.Play  IRC Trivia! Prove that you are the cleverest and fastest player. Play with gamers from around the world, become the best player of month or year and find yourself in the hall of Fame! Base of questions is constantly growing.IRC Quiz TRIVIA is a  Quiz game for your Android. Play with a friend online. The game will appeal to those who are the buff of the Scrabble and zynga, asvab, hangman, gallows, solve crossword, scan, sudoku puzzle and other kinds of puzzles.If you consider yourself the master of crossword,  solving challenging puzzles easily, then you should try  this game. Registration takes a few minutes, or even less, and you can immediately start playing. All your achievements will be saved, and every month and every year, you can compete for the title of best player of the month or year. Quiz attracts gamers by dinamism and even strategic complexity, that chess-players will fully appreciate! Ask your friends to download the app and play with them online! More downloads - more fun!The game has a chat , click on the menu button while playing and share experiences with your opponents.IRC Trivia is Didactic game,detecting qualities of players as attention and reaction.Quiz - a game which consists in answering the questions from various areas of knowledge. The peculiarity of this game is that several people will be trying to find out the correct word. The player who answers the question first, gets the bonus point. The player with the biggest amount of points per game is the winner.The Players are divided by rooms. There are special rooms for playing in English. Players get a question and try to answer it correctly . If the needed answer isn't done during the first period, the players get a hint. The first hint - the number of letters in answer. Then the letters one by one will be opened .Once the players give 15 correct answers,  the number of points will be counted. The player with the most points wins. If two or more players score the same, then the game continues until determine the winner.If you are tired, you can just chat in the game room and try to make new friends.online multiplayer quiz IRC mirc trivia addicts chat

reviews.title: Crowd pleaser
reviews.comment: Myself n my friends enjoy this game
reviews.author: nikki sparks
